subject: Baseball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez hit his 661st home run to pass Willie Mays for fourth on the career list, but the Yankees, who edged the Orioles, were not planning to pay him a bonus for the achievement.
snippet: Alex Rodriguez hit his 661st home run to pass Willie Mays for fourth on the career list, but the Yankees, who edged the Orioles, were not planning to pay him a bonus for the achievement.
